Interface CompositionContext

Instructs the composition engine how to dynamically compose a component.

Hierarchy

  • CompositionContext

Index

  • childContainer

Properties

bindingContext

bindingContext: any
  • Defined in node_modules/aurelia-templating/dist/aurelia-templating.d.ts:258

The context in which the view model is executed in.

Optional childContainer

childContainer: Container
  • Defined in node_modules/aurelia-templating/dist/aurelia-templating.d.ts:253

The child Container for the component creation. One will be created from the parent if not provided.

container

container: Container
  • Defined in node_modules/aurelia-templating/dist/aurelia-templating.d.ts:248

The parent Container for the component creation.

Optional model

model: any
  • Defined in node_modules/aurelia-templating/dist/aurelia-templating.d.ts:273

Data to be passed to the "activate" hook on the view model.

Optional overrideContext

overrideContext: any
  • Defined in node_modules/aurelia-templating/dist/aurelia-templating.d.ts:263

A secondary binding context that can override the standard context.

Optional owningView

owningView: View
  • Defined in node_modules/aurelia-templating/dist/aurelia-templating.d.ts:288

The view inside which this composition is happening.

Optional skipActivation

skipActivation: boolean
  • Defined in node_modules/aurelia-templating/dist/aurelia-templating.d.ts:303

Should the composition system skip calling the "activate" hook on the view model.

Optional view

view: string | ViewStrategy
  • Defined in node_modules/aurelia-templating/dist/aurelia-templating.d.ts:293

The view url or view strategy to override the default view location convention.

Optional viewModel

viewModel: any
  • Defined in node_modules/aurelia-templating/dist/aurelia-templating.d.ts:268

The view model url or instance for the component.

Optional viewModelResource

viewModelResource: HtmlBehaviorResource
  • Defined in node_modules/aurelia-templating/dist/aurelia-templating.d.ts:278

The HtmlBehaviorResource for the component.

viewResources

viewResources: ViewResources
  • Defined in node_modules/aurelia-templating/dist/aurelia-templating.d.ts:283

The view resources for the view in which the component should be created.

viewSlot

viewSlot: ViewSlot
  • Defined in node_modules/aurelia-templating/dist/aurelia-templating.d.ts:298

The slot to push the dynamically composed component into.
